channel.title: influxdb on emacsist
channel.description: Recent content in influxdb on emacsist

item.title: SpringBoot结合InfluxDB收集监控统计信息
item.description: pom.xml <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId> </dependency> <!-- 统计信息输出到 influxdb --> <dependency> <groupId>io.micrometer</groupId> <artifactId>micrometer-registry-influx</artifactId> </dependency> application.properties #### Spring Boot 监控 management.metrics.export.influx.enabled=true management.metrics.export.influx.auto-create-db=true management.metrics.export.influx.db=app_met
